name: Mercury
facts: Closest planet to the Sun. Smallest planet in the Solar System.

name: Venus
facts: Second planet from the Sun. Hottest planet due to greenhouse effect.

name: Earth
facts: Third planet from the Sun. Only planet known to support life.

name: Mars
facts: Fourth planet from the Sun. Known as the Red Planet.

name: Jupiter
facts: Largest planet in the Solar System. Gas giant with a Great Red Spot.

name: Saturn
facts: Famous for its large rings. Gas giant.

name: Uranus
facts: Ice giant. Rotates on its side.

name: Neptune
facts: Farthest planet from the Sun. Known for strong winds.
